label: 大江匡衡
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (952-1012). Great-grandfather of Masafusa. Erudite" of literature. Tutor to the Crown Prince. Private collection Gōri bushū 江吏部集. Compositions in Honchō monzui (47). Kanshi in Wakan rōeishū 和漢朗詠集 (4), Shinsen rōeishū 新撰朗詠集 (15), and Wakan kensakushū (5). [匡房、本朝文粋、漢詩、和漢兼作集] "
